text: Mi pecado is a Mexican telenovela. It is produced by Televisa. == Cast == Actor Character Daniela Castro Rosario Pedraza Vda. de Córdoba Maite Perroni Lucrecia Córdoba Pedraza de Huerta Eugenio Siller Julián "El Chamuco" Huerta Almada Sergio Goyri Gabino Roura Béltran Sabine Moussier Justina Almada de Huerta Francisco Gattorno Rodolfo Huerta Jessica Coch Renata Valencia == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2009 television series debuts Category:Telenovelas by Televisa Category:2000s Mexican television series debuts Category:2009 television series endings Category:2009 disestablishments in Mexico
title: Mi pecado
